feideList: This website will use cookies to be able to store your questions.
The quizmaster will not be able to see who answered what but will be able to see incorrect answers.
This website will store date linked to your user for you to be able to see previous quizzes.
You will be able to delete all data stored about you by going in to profile and pressing "Delete data".
To be able to sign in with Feide, you will have to accept that we use cookies and store information about you below.
anonymousList: If you chose to sign in anonymously we will not store cookies or save any data about you.
If you chose to sign in anonymously you will not be able to see previously attended quizzes.
